turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. I was wondering if you could help me make an order for pizza at Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. that sounds delicious, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need two large pizzas, both of them with gluten-free crust. And on the first one, I want sausage and onions. And on the other one, I just want onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the order for 2 large pizzas, both with gluten free crust, 1 with sausage and onions, and 1 with onions comes out to.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Could you make it for carryout?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. i've submitted your order for carry out. it'll b ready in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need assistance with anything else?
